ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.configuration.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Model component of the Configuration MVC triplet. This model will handle maintenance of the application wide settings which others can call upon.

      • isDownloadImagesEnabled

        public java.lang.Boolean isDownloadImagesEnabled()
        Check if download images is enabled for the application
        Returns:

        Set the value of download images setting
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true == user id has been assigned, false == otherwise
